youtube.title: How Dentists Repair a Split Tooth | 3D Medical Animation
youtube.description: Learn the step-by-step process of how a split tooth is repaired in this detailed 3D biology animation. From cleaning the crack to applying the restorative resin, see how modern dentistry saves your smile. Perfect for students and curious minds!
